name: Lingqiao Liu
content: Staff Directory | Associate Professor Lingqiao Liu × Search University staff directory Login Associate Professor Lingqiao Liu Position Senior Lecturer Org Unit Computer Science Email lingqiao.liu@adelaide.edu.au Telephone 831 32133 Location Floor/Room 1.23 , Australian Institute for Machine Learning Building , Lot 14 View My Researcher Profile Biography/ Background Dr. Lingqiao Liu is a Senior Lecturer and former ARC DECRA Fellow in School of Computer Science, University of Adelaide, Australia. He obtained his P.h.D. from the Australian National University in 2014. He is a recipient of ARC DECRA (Discovery Early Career Researcher Award) award in 2016 and the University of Adelaide Research Fellowship award in 2016.  He has a broad research interest in machine learning, computer vision, natural language and processing.
